outputs.output_descr: The project will support the local Government to effectively manage the large scale recovery and reconstruction work arising from the damages. The project (a) attempts to jump start recovery process by restoring and enhancing Local Government capacities to deliver emergency assistance, (b) supports spontaneous recovery initiatives including rebuilding of houses, and (c) aids resumption of key services and facilities that restore normalcy.

Enhanced capacity of the ER Cluster to undertake coordination through the preparation of analysis and tools which can be used by the Government of Indonesia in the coordination of early recovery in current and future recovery activities
Restore and enhance local government capacities to plan, coordinate and implement recovery activities
Provide support local government in the environmental management of recovery, including the immediate removal of earthquake waste and recycling of appropriate materials
Support local government to support the repair and reconstruction houses using 'build back better' approaches
Provide opportunities for the restoration and enhancement of the livelihoods of affected populations

project_descr: Recovery Initiatives for Sumatera Earthquakes (RISE): to support the GOI establish rehablitation and reconstruction planning and implementation process.
